title: gOpAla sEvEham
sahitya:
gOpAlam sEvEham


anupallavi

  gOpAlam sEvEham pApa nikara nAshanam


caraNam 1    lOkEsham vikasita sharadija jalaruha sama ruci lOcanam 
nAkEshanutam-anghri natajana bhavabhaya haramiha
     caraNam 2    kALindI taTakrta viharaNamati mrdu hasamuru 
kAmadam kALIya mardaharam kamala jana tapadamayi
    caraNam 3    dIram tam sumavishikha sadhrsha nijatanu nirupama dIdhitim 
sArasanAbha mati sarabhasaditi suta haramanantam
